questions.question: How quickly can we get started with SlotEase?
questions.answer: Most organizations are up and running within 10 minutes using our Smart Setup Wizard. The AI guides you through configuration based on your service type.

questions.question: Does SlotEase integrate with existing systems?
questions.answer: Yes, SlotEase offers robust API integration capabilities and can connect with most existing healthcare, government, and business management systems.

questions.question: What about data security and privacy?
questions.answer: We use enterprise-grade encryption, are GDPR compliant, and maintain SOC 2 Type II certification. Your data security is our top priority.

questions.question: Can customers book without creating accounts?
questions.answer: Absolutely. SlotEase supports guest booking with phone verification, making it accessible to everyone regardless of technical comfort level.
